channel.title: uncertainty on James Brennan
channel.description: Recent content in uncertainty on James Brennan

item.title: Estimating CDFs from data done right
item.description: This post looks at estimating empirical cumulative density functions (CDFs) and their confidence intervals from data.

item.title: Confidence intervals for LOWESS models in python
item.description: LOWESS (or also referred to as LOESS for locally-weighted scatterplot smoothing) is a non-parametric regression method for smoothing data. But how do we get uncertainties on the curve?
